title: Microsoft Surface 2019 event in under 11 minutes
description: Microsoft's 2019 Surface event was filled with big announcements, including the Surface Neo dual-screened device that runs Windows 10X, the Android-powered Surface Duo, and the Surface Pro X that's built with a custom Qualcomm SQ1 chipset. The Surface Pro 7's debut wasn't much of a shock, but there were other surprises, too, like the new Surface Earbuds, and the debut of a Surface Laptop 3, which will be available in 13- or 15-inch sizes.
